title: Children of two worlds
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Edwin Scragg
brief_description: A child’s limited language ability can be a permanent bar to development in formal subjects. Looks at the problems of migrant children whose first language is not English, and the role of teachers in helping such children gain a thorough understanding and command of the English language. Suitable for tertiary/teacher education.
